name: Poopin Ghosts
description:
Can you save Halloween by stopping the ghosts from pooping on the pumpkins? Poopin Ghosts is fun for the whole family. Enjoy this game all year round!

"This game is both fun and funny! It's a must have!"

Objective:

Save Halloween by stopping the ghosts from pooping on the pumpkins.

To stop the ghost use your candy cannon to shoot candy at the ghosts. If you hit a ghost, it will explode and you will get 50 points for each ghost you hit. You will lose 25 points for each ghost that flies off the screen without getting hit.

To win, complete all 5 levels to save Halloween.

100 points will be deducted for each pumpkin that gets pooped on.

If 3 pumpkins get pooped on in any level, you loose.

Happy Halloween!
